titleStmt.title: Dr. Reignolds his letter to that worthy councellor, Sir Francis Knolles concerning some passages in Dr. Bancrofts sermon at Pavles Crosse, Feb. 9. 1588. in the Parliament time. As also A qvestion resolved by a learned doctor, whether the angels of the seaven churches, Revel. 2, & 3. make for Episcopall præ-eminence Jure Divino.
titleStmt.author: Rainolds, John, 1549-1607.

titleStmt.title: Dr. Reignolds his letter to that worthy councellor, Sir Francis Knolles concerning some passages in Dr. Bancrofts sermon at Pavles Crosse, Feb. 9. 1588. in the Parliament time. As also A qvestion resolved by a learned doctor, whether the angels of the seaven churches, Revel. 2, & 3. make for Episcopall præ-eminence Jure Divino.
titleStmt.author: Rainolds, John, 1549-1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W.I. dweling in Red-crosse Street,

notesStmt.note: Also published, in 1641, with title: 'The judgement of Doctor Reignolds concerning episcopacy, whether it be Gods ordinance'.
First published, in 1608, as part of: 'Informations, or a protestation, and a treatise from Scotland. Seconded with D. Reignoldes his letter to Sir Francis Knollis.' (STC 14084).
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
